it.unitn.ing.rista.diffr.data
Class FdtTransformToMBin

java.lang.Object
  it.unitn.ing.rista.diffr.data.FdtTransformToMBin
public class FdtTransformToMBin
extends java.lang.Object

The FdtTransformToMBin is a class to read the binary FDT datafile of the INEL banana detector and transform it reduced in MBin (Maud binaries) to compact data.

Since:
JDK1.1
